snippet: The Dow and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose solidly on Tuesday, but big gains for the Nasdaq were undermined by declines in stocks like Netflix and Tesla.
abstract: Stock market ends higher after volatile session, lifted by gains in blue-chip names; Dow and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index rise solidly, but big gains for Nasdaq continue to be undermined by declines in stocks like Netflix and Tesla.
lead_paragraph: The Dow and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose solidly on Tuesday, but big gains for the Nasdaq were undermined by declines in stocks like Netflix and Tesla.

headline.main: Blue Chips Ride to the Rescue Despite Softening in Some High-Flying Shares
headline.print_headline: Blue Chips Ride to the Rescue Despite Softening in Some High-Flying Shares
